title: Vegetarian red wine spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: ['200g Quorn® mince', 'cooking spray', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 spaghetti Bolognese OXO® cube', '2 teaspoons mixed herbs', '1 teaspoon basil', '2 tablespoons double concentrated tomato puree', '2 teaspoons marmite', '1 handful cherry tomatoes, chopped (optional)', '1 handful mushrooms, sliced (optional)', '250ml red wine', '400g spaghetti', 'salt and pepper to taste']
